Plot: An Iranian man deserts his French wife and her two children to return to his homeland. Meanwhile, his wife starts up a new relationship, a reality her husband confronts upon his wife's request for a divorce.
Title: The Past
Actors: Bérénice Bejo, Ali Mosaffa, Tahar Rahim, Pauline Burlet
tomatoConsensus: Beautifully written, sensitively directed, and powerfully acted, The Past serves as another compelling testament to Asghar Farhadi's gift for finely layered drama.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 12 wins & 33 nominations.
